DzTexturePicker Class Reference
[Core Classes, Basic Types]

Base class for objects that provide a method of selecting or loading textures. More...

Public Slots

virtual QString getDescription () const =0

Detailed Description

Base class for objects that provide a method of selecting or loading textures.

Plug-ins can provide custom methods of loading, opening, or selecting images for textures by subclassing DzTexturePicker.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

QString DzTexturePicker::getDescription (  )  const [pure virtual, slot]

Subclasses should implement this method to return a short string that will appear in the image menu for the user to activate the picker.
